'''''Creating Gollum''''' is a collectible DVD and book set containing information on how [[Gollum]] was created and portrayed for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|The Lord of the Rings Film Series]].

== History ==
''Creating Gollum'' was released on [[1 January]] [[2003]] by [[New Line Cinema|New Line Home Entertainment]]. The Disc is titled ''Capturing Movie Memories: The Gollum "Sméagol" Collectible.'' A [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w_Z7YUyCEGE digital portrayal] of the DVD was posted on YouTube by "nature video" on [[11 December]] [[2013]].
